title: Store Configuration
description: Configuration for the reserve store including resupply settings and current stock

currentStock.description: Array of Reserve UUIDs currently available for purchase in the store

resupplyItems.description: Static resupply items with fixed pricing and enabled status

id.description: Unique identifier for the resupply item

price.description: Price of the resupply item in Manna

enabled.description: Whether the resupply item is currently available

rankDistribution.description: Distribution of reserve ranks in resupply (how many of each rank)

rank1Count.description: Number of Rank 1 reserves to include in resupply

rank2Count.description: Number of Rank 2 reserves to include in resupply

rank3Count.description: Number of Rank 3 reserves to include in resupply

notes: currentStock contains UUIDs of reserves that pilots can currently purchase
resupplySettings controls how the store refreshes its inventory
Resupply can be triggered manually by admin or automatically based on settings
